description: You are standing in small cave. You can see

You can see nothing at all, because it's completely dark in that direction.
The sign says 'I'm wandering around in a everlasting tale,
seeking the light to regain my pride
Corama...
You are standing in the north-west part of the lair. Here's
another sign. There are a exit from the lair to the north.
7419.name: The square lair

description: You see a small tunnel leading north.
another part of the lair.
another part of the lair.

description: You climb farther up...

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop
down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually

like a waterfall, into the pool far down. Under you there is a small fissure
in the rock. It seems big enough to contain a few people.
7070.name: A ledge by the dark pool

description: You can't see a thing. It's too dark.
The writing says 'DANGER!!!'
You are in a room, which once had been quite burned.
There is writing on the wall.
7429.name: The burned room

description: You can see a red glow
You are swimming in DARKNESS. You feel something
touching your right leg.
7445.name: The pool

description: To dark to tell.
You can feel a warm breeze.
This is the kind of place to rest, though the smell could be a LOT better
than this. The sewer goes east, north and west from here.
7021.name: A quiet pipe junction

description: West. There's an ordinary bend leading south into the sewer system in
that direction.
The mass is nothing but a mass, but it is quite suspicious!
You are at a end of a long tunnel. Right in front of you,
you can see a grey mass. To the east you can see a tremendous
long tunnel, but you know that, you has just been there.

description: A grey mass is blocking the way.
You stand in a junction leading north, west and east.
7049.name: The junction

description: You are in the middle of a bend in the pipe system of the sewer system,
WHAT a place!!! The pipe leads to the south and the east.
7016.name: The ordinary bend

description: East. What a quiet place you've found there. It's an intersection that have

South. You see nothing at all in that direction it's too dark anyway.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue west and north. To the east there's water

sewer.
7060.name: The dark passageway

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light

7017.name: The sewer junction

description: North. You see a bend.
West. There's a junction with four pipelines in that direction.
South. It looks like a pipe junction just like this one. Only that one

This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet
here. The pipelines lead west, east and north.
7018.name: The ordinary junction

description: To the north you can see a junction like this one, leading north and west.
There's a bend to the west leading north.
You are in yet another sewer drain.
7220.name: a sewage drain

description: You see a sewer drain continuing to the north.
You can see another drain to the east.
This is a Room with walls that glitters like gold though not quite like it.
This is strange as it looks as if the glitter lights the whole room. It
looks very bright. To the south the floor is covered with yucky water. The
North leads to sort of a Guard Room.
7046.name: The Sewer room

description: To the north you can see the guard room.
To the south there is nothing but water and an exit leads east from there.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You are standing in something that reminds you very much of porridge, this
has the advantage that it's not hot, it's rather cold actually. The pipe
bends to the north and east.
7006.name: The muddy sewer

description: The pipe leads into a bend that goes south. Interesting, there's mud on the
floor there.
The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.
You are in a half-dry sewer drain. To the north the drain runs a little bit

7217.name: The half-dry drain.

description: You see the drain running down into some water.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.
You see a drain running to the west.
You can see nothing but smoke.
7440.name: SW part of basilisks cave

7229.name: The strange sewer

description: You see a slimy sewer drain.
You are standing in a lot of mud. The mud goes to your
chest. You feel the presence of something IN the mud.
The only obvious exit is to the west.
7406.name: The mudhole

description: You can see nothing at all.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You stand in a bend of the pipe system of the sewer with mud up to your
thighs. Contemplating a higher level of existence here would be utterly
inappropriate, as the smell would keep any intelligent creature from even
thinking of anything but getting away from this foul end of the WORLD.
The bend goes from north to west.
7014.name: Muddy sewer

description: North. Filled with mud, that place looks like an impassable intersection

West. There's less mud that way, maybe you're on your way out of this foul
place.
You stand in a junction of sewer pipes leading north, east and west.
7028.name: The sewer junction

You can't see anything in that darkness.
In the south end of the pipe the "floor" is completely covered with water.
The skeletons looks like they had suffered the death of hunger.
One of them looks like he has written something at the wall.
The writing says 'A pray to the GODS will not be heard, though
the only exit is death..... Mother, I love you'.
This room is very hot. There are flames surrounding you.  You can
see no exits at all!  Skeletons are lying all over the floor.

description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT

This isn't your idea of a place to stay too long. You're in up to your

The pipe leads into a intersection that goes south and east. The floor here

When you examine the mud, you notice small worms crawling

The worms are purple. They do not look edible.
You are standing in a mud-like substance. The smell here is
awful, it is rotten. To the west you can see some light.

On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the

The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
7207.name: The lair.

description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You fall deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....

There is dust all over the place. It looks like nobody

You see a grey block.

You see another part of the lair.

You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

deeper....

The ledge continues south into darkness.
As you enter the room it starts rotating - at first slowly, later faster

blue.
This looks like a evil dragon
This looks like a good dragon
This looks like a neutral dragon

description: you see nothing special.
you see a room far away.

You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but

The ledge leads further south.
You can see that they have been killed in some sort of way. Not
by sword or club.
On the table there is dust, in the center there is a small statue of a
Dragon sleeping.
it looks like a silver dragon. It is nailed onto the table.
The dragon sits on a red dragon that looks dead. But the
eyes of the red dragon is glowing pulsating red. You feel
drained.
You can see a table in front of you. It's very dusty.
Around the table five skeletons are sitting. Exits are
north and east.
7420.name: The lair end

description: the northern part of the lair.
the eastern part of the lair.
You are standing in mud up to your ankles. This is an intersection with

7024.name: The sewer

To the south there's another intersection with pipes going south and east.
You Stumble Over A Rock......
You begin to roll Down this shaft....
You Roll Down Farther and Farther....
Downwards...Rolling....
7446.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Down

description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT

This one seems interesting, a big difference from all the other junctions.
It seems cleaner than the rest of them. Weird. Something that looks like

The pipes lead to the south, west and north.
7026.name: A junction

description: North. You see an intersection there, leading north and east.

To the south there's ANOTHER junction leading west and east.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.

description: You can hardly make out much more than that the next place is in a pipe

The sign says 'Gods of War I call you, my sword is by my side,
I seek a light free from all false pride'
Reyemle Grug.....
You are standing in the north-east part of the lair. You see

description: You see a wooden door
another part of the lair.
another part of the lair.

SPLAT!!!
It looks as if it can be opened in a door-like fashion. Maybe this will lead
the way down.
This is truly a weird piece of craftsmanship in your eyes. The edge seems to
form a step leading down, but WHAT a STEP DOWN. The Abyss opens down there
leading to seemingly total destruction.
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the
north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of Abyss of total
darkness. The ledge seems to have an odd-looking edge here.
7111.name: Southwestern corner of the ledge

description: North. The ledge leads further north.
You see a broad ledge leading eastward.
The Abyss lies down there. Who knows what might lurk down there?
South of here is the exit from the ledge.
This chair is made of marble, but the fact that it is worn and attached to the
floor makes you think twice about taking it along with you.
The only thing in this room of interest is a chair, and that's tight to the
rock floor. A doorway leads south and another leads east into darkness.
7050.name: The small room

description: Utter darkness...!
You can see a room with a lot of light in it. You can't make out any details.
You have never seen anything so BORING...This is an intersection with pipes

7025.name: Another intersection

description: To the north there's an intersection, where the pipes are leading west and
east. You notice that the floor to the west is covered in mud.
Another intersection lies to the south. It leads west and south.
You are in a sewer with more scratches on the walls. And of course a whole lot

7232.name: The sewer

description: You see yet another sewer line.
You see a sewer pipe.
The pool side is dimly lit up by your light. You can see absolutely nothing

7199.name: The Edge of the Water

continue forward.
7106.name: Northwestern corner of the ledge

description: The ledge continues east.
The ledge continues south.
You stand in the middle of a pipe that leads from north to south. Above you

7043.name: The Sewer Entrance

description: To the north you can just make out a huge shaft leading down.
You are standing in dust. This place has not been
touched for a long time. Otherwise it is quite boring
here, looks like a place to rest! To the west you see
the outline of a door. A tunnel leads to the east.
7425.name: Dusty tunnel

description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards. It is quite
dark.
You can see the outline of a door. Just like in the
description!

description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.

You have wet feet, you are standing in water. The water looks calm. You can

7442.name: The northern end of the pool

description: You can see a small cave.
You can see more water.
You can see water.

description: You see a sewer drain.
You see a sewer drain.

description: North. The ledge leads further north.

South. You can just make out the south-western corner of this ledge.

description: To the north lies a dry four-way junction.

You definitely NOT like this area. It is very dank, and most

description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT

Your legs are covered in mud up to the knees. REAL yucky!

... And come to an abrupt end. THIS is strange indeed. There's an arched

A black hole in the wall.
You climb farther up...

there are two exits: south and down. You have a feeling the downward exit

description: nothing but darkness
You are swimming in water. It is getting deep here. It is dark in this end.

seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7454.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: You have never seen this kind of footprints before!
You are standing in a crossing of hallways. You can leave this place
in every direction, except up and down. In the dust you notice strange
footprints.
7426.name: The crossing

description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You are standing in the middle of a bend of the sewer pipe. It is very
dark around here and the mud is sticking to your legs, not very pleasant.
The pipe leads east and south from here.
7005.name: The muddy sewer

description: East. The mud stretches on into the darkness.
The red light glows from the walls.
The walls look alive.
The door is completely round without a keyhole.
The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue. You can hear wailing
through an open black hole to the east. To the south there is a round door.
7281.name: The corridor.

description: The hole seems more black than the night. It is appears to be "eating" the
red light around it.
You are in a dry but dirty sewer drain. The drain continues east and south.
7219.name: A dry sewer drain.

description: You see a half-dry drain.
You see another boring sewer drain.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to bend and lead south and west.
7061.name: The Watery Sewer Bend

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You float out into the water.  The ripple sends a shock wave to
this water, that seems to cringe as its disrupted.  You go towards the
hut that is in the middle of the lake...  Another mysterious voice
echos over the caverns...
7484.name: On The Dark Lake

description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the south. It looks as if
no person has ever sat his foot here before. It's too muddy for that
anyway. The sewer leads north, south and east from here.
7002.name: The muddy sewer junction

description: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the north.
East. The muddy sewer leads into a bend that goes south.
South. The muddy sewer ends in a mudhole that way.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.
7065.name: The Watery sewer

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness. There's an exit
leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again to do so.
7279.name: The Wall of the Abyss

description: You enter Golem's Hut. The smell of rotting flesh is strong in here.
The hut is very dark, and you can only see not to far ahead of you.
You can see a small opening to the west into another room.
This room is filled with all kinds of junk, all old and dusty.
7487.name: Golem's Hut

description: You stand in a large carvern, walking along its northern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7456.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: You are in a narrow crawlway.  You don't notice anything interesting here.
7209.name: The crawlway.

description: You see a four-way junction.
You see the entrance to a lair.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
You are in a dry part of the sewer. To the north is a wooden door, you
can see some slime at the lower part of the door. You also see some skulls
and some broken bones.
7208.name: The lair entrance.

description: You can see the lair.
You see a crawlway.
You are in a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the
substance you see a lot of decay. You see some odd scratches on the wall, as
from a gigantic rat. Both to the east and west the pipe seems to run down.
7230.name: The damp sewer

description: You see a sewer.
You see a sewer.
You can look in two different directions where the pipe goes : west and
north.
7035.name: The sewer pipe bend

description: North. You see another bend leading west.
You can see another junction although this one is a triple one with pipes
going south and west.
It looks like a adventurer who wasn't lucky. You better
watch out-
You are standing in the south-east part of the lair. You can
see a skeleton lying at the wall.
7417.name: The square lair

description: Another part of the lair
Another part of the lair
You stand in water to your waist.  To the north is the entrance to this room.
A single door leads east.
7047.name: The Pool in the Sewer

description: To the north you see the entrance to this room.
You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.
You are in a bend in the sewer pipe. A strong smell seeps in from the north.
The sewer goes north and east.
7010.name: A bend in sewer pipe

description: North. You are staring into a huge junction with exits in all directions.
East. The Pipe leads into utter darkness that way.
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.
7059.name: The dark passageway

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
This looks as if it has been standing here for at least 12 centuries. It's
Very worn and cracks in the surface mingle with the cores of mineral that
penetrates the rock from which these steps are chiselled.
This seems like an exceptionally heavy gate, made of thick iron.
This VERY old torch looks as if it has burned for ages, yet no traces of
the searing flame can be seen on it!
This is an utterly silent place. As you look around you see that there
hasn't been a living thing in a long time. The dust lies here in a thick
layer on the floor and on the furniture. On the wall hangs a bleak and
worn tapestry. A winding stone staircase leads up into darkness. On the
wall to the west you can see a huge torch stuck into the solid rock.
A large portcullis blocks your way to the north.
7301.name: Entrance to the Realm of silence

description: There is a crack here that looks like it has been made recently.
You stand in a completely dark cavern leading west.  The wall looks
weird here.  You notice a deep hole, which is going down.
7122.name: Under the pit

description: You stand in a narrow passage that seems to dead end.  Upon closer
inspection a tiny pinpoint of light can be seen north of here.
7048.name: The Sewers

description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the north.
7212.name: The sewer drain.

description: You can see the drain continuing north.
You can see the four-way junction.
You see a lot of organic decay on the floor.
You are in an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer wall,
ad a lot of debris on the floor.
7231.name: The strange sewer

description: You see a sewer.
You see another sewer.
You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red.  All kinds of bones
are scattered all over the floor.  On the walls you can see some burned
shapes.  You smell burned flesh.  Two creatures are melted into the floor.
You're next.
7428.name: Dragons lair

description: You can see a long tunnel.
You can see nothing but darkness.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its eastern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7461.name: In The Cavern, Along The E.Shore

description: You stand in a junction with pipes leading west, north and east.
7031.name: A triple junction

description: To the north there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.
East. You can just make out a triple junction leading north and east.
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just
to the north of here.  The ledge seems to lead around some sort of
abyss of total darkness.  There is a sewer line veering south, though
it is shrouded in complete darkness.
7121.name: Southeastern corner of the ledge

description: North of here you can see a ledge.
The ledge leads further west.
You float out into the water.  The ripple sends a shock wave to
this water, that seems to cringe as its disrupted.  You go towards the
hut that is in the middle of the lake...  Another mysterious voice
echos over the caverns...
7483.name: On The Dark Lake

description: You stand in a large carvern, walking along its northern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7457.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: You stand in a large carvern, walking along its eastern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7464.name: In The Cavern, Along The E.Shore

description: You never saw such disgusting matter before, it nearly makes you puke.
You are standing in what looks like a bend in the pipe system of the
sewer. The 'floor' is covered completely by mud! This includes covering
your legs up to your knees as well. The pipe leads west and south.
7103.name: A muddy bend in the sewer system

description: You can see a room in which mud drips from the roof onto the floor in
great cakes of sludge. There doesn't seem to be any exits from that room
apart from in you direction.
To the south there's less mud than here! It actually seems to end there!
You have a feeling it would be nice to have your feet free from mud again.
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.
7108.name: The narrow ledge

description: North. The ledge leads further north.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but
darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
The ledge continues further south into darkness.
You standing in water up to you neck. You can only see water.
7444.name: The south end of the pool

description: You can see calm water.
To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.
The tunnel continues north and south.  Thick slime oozes down the
walls, and the sound of some creature breathing echoes nearby.  There
is a smell of something dead in the air.
7402.name: Cave tunnel

description: To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.
You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.
7113.name: Narrow ledge going east to west

description: The ledge leads further east.
The ledge leads further west.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but
darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its southern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7471.name: In The Cavern, Along The S.Shore

description: You are standing by the edge of a dark pit that leads down into even
deeper darkness. >BWWAAADDRR< - The smell from down there is unbearable.
The sewer stretches into the darkness to the east.
7004.name: The Dark Pit

description: East. The sewer leads into the sewer junction.
The Dark Pit leads down and down and down ... well you can't see the
bottom anyway. There are bars that function as a ladder on the side.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to bend and lead west and north.
7068.name: The Watery sewer bend

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
Here There is almost no mud, as you stand at the top
of a small rock. Just beside you there are a sign which
says 'WARNING! The worms are dangerous!'.
7408.name: The long tunnel

description: You can see a lot of mud..Yarck!
The tunnel goes a little downwards.
You are in a sewer junction. To the north is a small hole, to the west is a
narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues.
7210.name: The four-way junction.

description: You can see a small cave-like room.
You can see a sewer drain.
You can see a narrow crawlway.
You can see a sewer drain.
You are standing on a ledge that seems quite a lot larger than the rest
of the ledges. This one leads to the west and the east, plus it has an exit
going to the south. Though you could jump into mid-air, but it probably
wouldn't be such a good idea.
7115.name: The Broad ledge

description: You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north.
7057.name: The dark passageway

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
A ladder leads up from here to the Shaft.
A small opening leads west from here.
7123.name: Under The Shaft

description: It's too dark up there.
You can see a narrow ledge going north and south.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You are standing in mud to your knees. This is not the kind of place
for a picnic. The muddy sewer stretches further into the south.
7001.name: The muddy sewer

description: You see the muddy sewer continuing into the darkness to the south.
You stand below a dark tunnel.  You see you can climb up here,
which is a way out.  Back east is the carvern.
7489.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Up

description: You climb farther up...
7490.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Up

description: You stand within a dank sewer pipe.  The pipe spans east and west.
7019.name: The sewer

description: it looks like bones of a human.
You are standing in a dark tunnel. It continues to the north
and to the south. Bones are spread on the floor
7435.name: Dark tunnel

description: This is a small fissure in the solid rock. Under you lies the deep dark pool.
The water trickles quietly down from the ledge above you. The water smells
like the water in a sewer.
7099.name: The fissure under the ledge

description: The water edge.
You never saw such disgusting matter before, it nearly makes you puke.
You stand in a small room with a great big opening in the ceiling. From this
opening there's mud dripping down in large lumps. >YUCK<. You can smell the
foul stench of the slimy sediment as you try not to get covered by the
falling sludge. To the east there is an entryway leading out from here and
it seems absolutely impossible to force the muddy descent.
7101.name: Under the mudhole

description: East. You see nothing of interest.
You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here so watch your step.
7118.name: The narrow eastern ledge

description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but
darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.
The ledge leads further south.
You climb farther up...
7493.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Up

description: These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe.  You'd better
not go down any further.
You are dangling on the slippery sides of the old well leading down and up.
The only secure point here is the metal bars that are cemented into the
sides, the ones that you cling frantically to so that you don't fall. Who
knows how deep this well is?
7105.name: Down the old well

description: There's a slight, dim light from above, or maybe it's your imagination.
Anyway it SEEMS darker down here than up there, if that is possible.
You stand in the middle of what looks like a triple junction of pipes
going east, west and north.
7104.name: A junction in the sewer pipes

description: You can see a mud area starting in that direction.
East. You can't even make out what it might look like, it's just too dark.
West. There's a room with a ladder leading up.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its northern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7480.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: You are in a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls.  The floor is
made from black stone.  In the western wall you see a large black stone door.
7201.name: The inner Lair

description: You see the treasury.
You look back through the door into the lair.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its northern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7479.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: The triangle is filled with small symbols in a language you have
never seen before.
This altar are very special. Faces are smiling from it. There
is a triangle in top of it.
You are in a very dark room. You notice that some faces are
staring at you from inside the walls. In the middle of the room
there is a small altar. To the north there is a small round
door.
7280.name: The entrance.

description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.
You are near Golem's Hut.  The hut is made from flesh, and other
things that excist from this carvern.  A small boat has been pulled up
against shore, and sits, waiting for its owner.  Some warmth comes
from the hut, and its entrance is to the south.
7486.name: Near Golem's Hut

description: This room is rich ornamented. The walls has carves showing
persons dancing around a sun which is drawn at the floor. It
looks very old, and it is very dusty. To the south you see a
secret door.
7416.name: The treasure room

description: you can see a picture with some persons crawling around a
huge moon.
You are walking in a tunnel. It is very cold. You
can feel the presence of a living thing ... SOMEWHERE.
7401.name: Cave tunnel

description: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.
To the south tunnel continuing.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its western shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7476.name: In The Cavern, Along The W.Shore

description: These look like they're pretty slippery, and not very safe, but perhaps safe
enough for you to climb down, WITH both hands on them.
You are standing by an old and worn well from before this century. The sewer
leads to the east from here and the well leads down into darkness. Metal
bars implanted in the side of the well lead down as a ladder.
7015.name: The old well

description: Down the well there's even less light than up here, so ... sorry, you can't
see a thing. There are metal bars in the side leading down into the darkness.
On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
7203.name: The Lair

description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You are in a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting.
7218.name: The very small room.

description: Through the little hole you can see a half-dry drain.
You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east
and west. To the west you see a wooden door.
7421.name: East tunnel

description: You can see a wooden door.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You stand in the middle of a huge junction of sewer pipes right under
what you'd think was an air shaft. The sewer pipes lead to the north,
south, east and west. It look quite impossible to force your way up.
7009.name: The Sewer Junction

description: YYEEUUCH! BOOH! THAT looks like a nice place for creepy crawlies.
A few yards ahead - away from this junction - there is a pit leading down,
but the smell from there...>PHEWW<.
North. This direction looks quite nice actually. The pipe leads into
a bend that goes east.
You fall deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
7450.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Down

description: You are standing in a cross. To the north you can see
some light. Otherwise it is dark.
7414.name: The stalagmite T-cross

description: You see some light ahead.
You climb farther up...
7492.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Up

description: You stand in a section of a pipe that leads to a dead end. In the floor
there's a pit leading down. There are bars set in the side of the pit wall
functioning as a ladder.
7036.name: The pit

description: Down the pit it's utterly dark you can't see a thing.
It's a small hole. About 1 feet in diameter.
There are a very small hole in wall, from where the smoke
are coming from. Otherwise it is pitch dark. Exits are north
and west.
7438.name: SE part of basilisks cave

description: You can see nothing but smoke
You can see nothing but smoke
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its northern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7455.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
7205.name: The Lair

description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You are standing in a junction of pipes that lead west, east and south.
7038.name: The three way junction

description: East. You can make out a dimly lit Guard Room.
To the south you can see what looks like a store room.
You are standing in a lot of mud. A disgusting smell surrounds
the place, and makes you feel sick. Small flames sometimes shoot
up from the hot mud. To the west there is a small door. To the
north you can see an iron door.
7286.name: The hells yard

description: To dark to tell.
To dark to tell.
You stand in a junction leading north, west and east.
7020.name: The junction

description: You stand in a rather odd intersection of pipes. The pipes actually don't
resemble pipes anymore. They look more like a real stone tunnel, or a
passageway hewn directly into the rock. The ways from here lead north, east
and west.
7112.name: An odd intersection

description: North. You see a ledge to something that looks like an abyss.
You can just make out the outline of a trapdoor here in the soil. The earth
is probably there to conceal a secret entrance. This looks as if it leads down
into the seemingly solid rock face of the ledge.
The ground here seems a little different from all the other ledges along the
Abyss. There's a kind of soft soil on this ledge, maybe you should look
carefully at this. It seems to be of some interest.
You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe,
solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the west and leads south
from here into darkness.
7116.name: Northeastern corner of the ledge

description: The ledge continues west.
The smell here is awful.  To the south you can see some smoke.
A tunnel leads north, and east.
7436.name: Entrance to lair

description: A small cave is to the east.
the only thing you can see are smoke.
You are clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to the ground
down below.
A large sign says : I haven't gotten any further ... Yet. But  I'm pushing
to get finished with this sewer.
Greetings and Good Health :)
Redferne The Gentle
This stops your journey down, the only exit is up.
7399.name: On the walls of the Abyss

description: The shadow looks like a man in great pain.
You are standing in nothing. All around you there are stars.
Sometimes a shadow flies closely by you, wailing very loudly.
To the north there is a small bright hole. To the west there is
a small red hole.
7282.name: The Realm of lost souls

description: You look into a very bright hole.
You look into a red hole.
It's NOT the kind of matter that would concern you too much, normally, but
as you are in the middle of it, it just might become your main concern.
REAL YUCKY!
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You wouldn't want to know the true feeling of standing in this mud up to
your hips. >BWAADR<. All that fills your mind right now is the dream of
a hot bath. This is NOT very clean mud you know, remember you're in the
sewer! The pipes leads north, south and east.
7013.name: A MUDDY intersection

description: North. Sludge and sediment fills this corridor of the sewer that leads
into a bend going west.
East. You can see absolutely nothing of interest in that direction (Maybe
that's why it's so damn interesting.??) There's no mud in that direction
either, GREAT!
South. All you can see is more mud! Although the pipe goes into a bend
leading west.
You stand in a junction of three sewer drains.  You see some odd
scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.  North and south
the sewer continues as usual, but west it looks a little strange.
There is a narrow drain passage leading down.
7224.name: The sewer junction

description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.
You see nothing but a sewer drain.
You stand in in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-like
room. You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as from a gigantic rat.
The sewer leads south.
7233.name: The sewer drain

description: You see a cave-like room.
You see a sewer.
You stand in a small room lit by a single torch set in the wall. The only
way out of here is to the north.
7039.name: The Sewer Store Room

description: To the north you see a pipe junction.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its western shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7473.name: In The Cavern, Along The W.Shore

description: You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of DikuMUD.
The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know.
With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 metres per second per second, you
are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the bottom will continue to
be a mystery. Bye Cruel World.
You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!
7190.name: Mid-air

description: You have entered a small tunnel. Here it is quite dry.
Maybe it would be an idea to rest here.
7412.name: The stalagmite tunnel

description: You can see a small cave to the north.
It looks as if it's made of stainless steel, and it would very well function
as a club of considerable power, but alas ... You can't take at all since
it's firmly set into the concrete wall.
You are standing in something that reminds you of an entry to an ant hive.
There are enormous concrete pipes leading north, south, east and west.
There's also a metal ladder built into the concrete wall leading up through
a layer of garbage.
7030.name: Quadruple Junction Under the Dump

description: To the north you can see a huge triple junction with sewer pipes leading
west and east.
Up through the garbage you can just make out what looks like the Dump in
Westbridge.
To the south there's a huge junction with pipes leading east and west.
You stand in water to your knees. A doorway leads west from here. The Pipe
stretches north.
7053.name: The South end of the Grand Pipe

description: You see a lot of pictures decorating the walls.
This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet
here.  The pipeline leads north and south.
7027.name: The ordinary junction

description: You are in an odd sewer pipe You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as
from a gigantic rat. You can see some slimy water gently running down into
a sewer drain, and north the drain continues.
7130.name: The sewer pipe.

description: You are in a little cave. You are able to see quite a lot of debris on the
floor. There is a sewer drain west of here.
7234.name: The rat's lair

description: You see the sewer system that way.
This is funny enough a wooden ladder and, after closer inspection, you
discover it is magically held towards the wall! You can't, even with your
greatest effort, rock it at ALL!
Nice place you found yourself. You stand in the middle of a room with only
two exits, Up and East. A tall ladder is left here so that you can climb
up through the Pit without the use of a rope.
7102.name: Under the Dark Pit

description: Up. You can't see a thing up there, it's way too dark.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its southern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7468.name: In The Cavern, Along The S.Shore

description: SMASH!!!
You slam face first into a large carvern. As you look
around, you see it is very dark in here.. Only a few
torches hang around the vast cavern, lighting its walls.
You see a large lake, the waters seem dark and cold.
In the center of the lake, you see a hut, and a small
torn-up boat on its shores.
7453.name: In A Large Cavern

description: You stand in a large carvern, walking along its eastern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7463.name: In The Cavern, Along The E.Shore

description: The stalagmites are very tall, and looks very beautiful.
You are standing in a stalagmite cave. Water is dripping
from the walls. It is very cold in here.
7411.name: The stalagmite cave

description: You see a long hallway, and some mud.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its eastern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7459.name: In The Cavern, Along The E.Shore

description: This is a statue of a imp, pointing to the west. The imp
looks like a man with horns and a tail.
As you look around you notice a small statue. There are
exits to the west and to the east.
7410.name: The small room

description: It is pitch dark out there.
You see a VERY long hallway.
You float out into the water.  The ripple sends a shock wave to
this water, that seems to cringe as its disrupted.  You go towards the
hut that is in the middle of the lake...  Another mysterious voice
echos over the caverns...
7482.name: On The Dark Lake

description: You read the number '666'.
This is a heavy black stone door it looks very solid.
You are in a small but well equipped treasury.  You can see some writing on
the wall.  The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see.  You can
get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.
7200.name: The Treasury

description: You look back through the opening into the inner lair.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its southern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7470.name: In The Cavern, Along The S.Shore

description: You are in a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.
7211.name: The small cave.

description: You look back into the four-way junction.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead into a junction going south, north and east.
7064.name: The Watery Sewer Junction

description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light
that far.
You are in a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole.
You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. There
is a sewer drain south.
7225.name: The sewer

description: You see a sewer drain.
The water floats to the east from here.
You are in a drain, with some slimy water on the floor.
7222.name: The sewer drain.

description: You see a sewer bend.
You see a sewer drain.
It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there's quite a drop
down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the darkness,
mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the sewer actually
washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From here it drops,
like a waterfall, into the pool far down.
7069.name: A ledge by the dark pool

description: You can't see a thing. It's too dark.
You fall deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
7451.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Down

description: You fall deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
7448.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Down

description: You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of Merc Mud.
The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know.
With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 metres per second per second, you
are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the bottom will continue to
be a mystery. Bye Cruel World.
You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!
7114.name: Mid-air

description: You are in Golem's sleeping area.  This room is very dark, and the
smell of rotting flesh is the strongest here.  In one corner you see a
pile of dirty clothing, which is used for sleeping on.  Much more junk
is scattered around here, all collecting dust..
7488.name: Golem's Sleeping Chambers

description: You are in the progress of walking all the way around the ledge since there's
no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS another exit
from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a
free fall session afterwards.
7107.name: The narrow ledge

description: North. The ledge leads into a corner and turns eastward.
You stare into mid-air, and right under there's absolutely nothing but
darkness. You shiver by the thought of falling an utterly unknown distance.
South. The ledge leads further south into utter darkness.
It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
This is not your idea of a holiday. You stand in mud up to your knees.
It's absolutely inconceivable how all this mud could have been placed
here. The pipe leads to the west and south.
7012.name: The bend in the Muddy sewer

description: West. All you can see, is that the pipe leads into a bend that goes
north. But there's less mud in that direction, however odd that sounds.
South. There's even more mud that way, incredible! Although it looks
like an intersection in the sewer system that leads east and south.
You are at the end of the drain around you the sewer has collapsed, the only
exit is west.
7214.name: The drain end.

description: You see the sewer drain.
You climb farther up...
7494.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Up

description: You fall deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
deeper....
7449.name: A Dark Tunnel Going Down

description: You are in what reminds you of a foul sewer, as if you liked being here!
You can see two exits leading either north or south.
7051.name: The Sewer pipe

description: To the south you can see a strange light flowing from there.
You are in a passageway in the pipes of the sewer system leading north, east
and west.
7044.name: The junction going three ways

description: West. You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north
and west.
You see some persons dancing around a huge sun. The
sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size
of the picture.
This room is obviously a blind end. To the north you see
a primitive picture.
7415.name: The blind end room

description: You see a primitive picture
You float out into the water.  The ripple sends a shock wave to
this water, that seems to cringe as its disrupted.  You go towards the
hut that is in the middle of the lake...  Another mysterious voice
echos over the caverns...
7485.name: On The Dark Lake

description: The hay is very dirty. The smell of it makes you feel sick.
You can see some hay spread on the floor. The smell is awful here,
and it makes you feel sick.  The basilisk sleeps here.
Watch out ... Maybe it is not far away.
7439.name: NW part of basilisks cave

description: You are very surprised, as this room for a change are
hot instead of cold. To the north it goes downwards into
some mud. There are also an exit to the west.
7409.name: The hot room

description: You see a lot of mud.
You see a entrance to a small room.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its southern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7469.name: In The Cavern, Along The S.Shore

description: It's dark as tar and looks like something out of a toilet, on top of THAT
the smell is absolutely OVERWHELMING.
You have both your feet safely stuck in mud. It isn't the mud that's wrong
it's the smell, the sounds, the total darkness that surrounds you. Everything
here is so depressing. The pipe leads on with a trail of thick mud to the
north, east and south.
7008.name: A muddy intersection

description: North. The pipe goes into a bend with a load of mud all the way up the walls.
The bend leads west.
East. This way like a place for the annual mud festival, although the stench
wouldn't allow any happiness at all. The pipe leads into a bend that leads
north.
You are in a narrow part of the sewer. Down the sewer continues and to the
north is the ledge.
7129.name: The sewer line.

description: You look deeper down into the drain.
You stand in the middle of a huge junction of concrete sewer pipes. The
pipes lead into three different directions : east, south and west.
7029.name: The Triple Junction

description: East. You can see a bend in the sewer pipe leading north.
To the south there's a ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by
an odd light.
You are standing in a large room with chairs set in the walls. You have the
feeling of being watched. To the south there's an entry to a larger room.
The room is lit by five torches, also set in the walls. To the west there
is a doorway leading out to the sewers.
7045.name: The Sewer Room

description: To the west you can see the sewers.
You can see an even larger room than this one, filled with light.
The stone looks very uninteresting. BUT as you are
about to turn away, you see a lightstribe coming
through a small hole. Conclusion: The stone is movable.
The mud are getting deeper. You are wondering, 'Would
it be an idea to leave, before I disappear?'. To the
south you notice a flat round stone are blocking the
way. To the west you can see mud.
7404.name: Cave turning-point

description: You can see an opening behind the stone.
A sign is blocking the way. It says 'we have closed an entrance to DEATH'
The narrow tunnel goes east and west here.  A shallow river of
sewage runs along its length, as rats and other vermin scurry about
looking for food.
7432.name: A narrow tunnel

description: Firmly set into the wall of the shaft it's impossible to even rock, is your
estimate.
You are standing by the edge of a deep, dark shaft leading down. A single
ladder is your tool to work your way down if you so wish. The sewer pipe
leads south from here.
7041.name: The Shaft

description: Down and utter darkness. There's absolutely nothing to be seen in that
direction.
To the south you can see the pipe leading further south into darkness.
All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
7206.name: The lair.

description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You stand in a large carvern, walking along its northern shores.
The carvern is very large, and stinks of death.  The walls are very
straight up, and no exits are apparent.  The water in the lake doesn't
seem to move, only sit there in total silent.  You think you hear
someone's voice echo.
7458.name: In The Cavern, Along The N.Shore

description: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.
7422.name: North tunnel

description: The dark tunnel continues.
You can see a cave entrance.
You can see the lair.
It is hard to see here because of the smoke. To the north you
can see barely see a small tunnel. Other exits are to the south
and to the west.
7437.name: NE part of Basilisks cave

description: It looks dark and murky, and emanates a foul stench.
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The sewer
seems to lead south and north.
7067.name: The Watery sewer

description: When you look at the skeletons, you can see that they once had been in great
pain. They are hanging in their arms, and some of them has been killed
with a sharp instrument.
The metal box is covered with dust. You notice that is once has been
filled with coal, as you see some of them.
You are standing in a middle of a square room. Along the walls skeletons
are hanging in rusty chains. In the middle of the room there is a big metal
box, covered with dust. To the south you can just make out a small exit.
7285.name: The tortureroom.

description: To dark to tell.
The breeze comes from a hole above you. NO way to get up
there.
This narrow tunnel is dark, damp and lingers with the stench of raw
sewage and decay.  It continues east and west from here.
7430.name: A narrow tunnel

description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the
forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.
On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also
see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.
7204.name: The Lair

description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see the lair entrance.
The glittering silver looks like it is INSIDE the walls.
This room are all bright. In the walls you can see some
silver.  The tunnels lead east and south from here.
7431.name: The glittering room

description: You are standing in deep darkness. To the south there is a small exit.
To the east you can see a gaping hole.
7423.name: The L-shaped room.

description:
The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you
arrives.  It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up ... Hsss', while
it moves closer.  'Can one NEVER sleep in peace ... Hsss'.
7040.room_name: The red fierce-looking dragon stares at you angrily.
7040.name: the red dragon~

description:
The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you feel the deepest fear.
Big yellow eyes and sharp teeth.  Its ears are very big,
and it has small sharp horns.  It hates beauty.
7041.room_name: The sea hag is swimming around here.
7041.name: the sea hag~

description:
The naga are a snake-liked creature. She is covered in green-gold
scale with silvery triangles along her back. Her eyes are golden.
She notice that you look at her, and she says: 'Watch out. This way
leads to some evil creatures'.
7042.room_name: The guardian naga looks kindly at you.
7042.name: the guardian naga~

description:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong
toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly. It's eyes are
glowing pale green.
7043.room_name: The scaled basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
7043.name: the scaled basilisk~

description:
This looks like a vaguely human blob. Big black yellow eyes, and a
mouth going a little bit out from the face. The lemure does not look
interested in you at all, but anyway it attacks. It looks like it's
mind has been burned out.
7044.room_name: The lemure blob slithers terribly precisely towards you for an attack!
7044.name: the lemure blob~

description:
At the first sight you thought Jones was an orc, but when it came
closer you saw his second head. He wears an animal skin dress,
filthy and moth eaten. Jones really stinks...
7045.room_name: Jones 'Cruncher' the ettin is standing here glaring at you.
7045.name: Jones~

description:
When you look at Herald, you feel pity. His dress are really poor,
and the one of his heads hangs down. At the rope around his stomach
hangs dead mouses and rats. He does not smell good.
7046.room_name: Herald 'Mouse-Killer' the ettin is standing here looking confused at you.
7046.name: Herald~

description:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high. Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand. In the center of its head are four large
tentacles with very sharp points.
7201.room_name: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
7201.name: the senior mindflayer~

description:
This mindflayer is six foot high. It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth. It has four small tentacles in the 
center of its head.
7202.room_name: The jr. mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
7202.name: the jr. mindflayer~

description:
The wererat is about four foot tall. It looks very much like rat, except
that it is standing.
7203.room_name: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
7203.name: the ugly wererat~

description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.
7000.room_name: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...
7000.name: the horrifying mudmonster~

description:
You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature,
though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there. The thought of arousing this
cruel creature doesn't seem appealing.
7001.room_name: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling.
7001.name: the small bat~

7002.room_name: The huge hungry-looking sewer rat sits here.
7002.name: the great sewer rat~

7004.room_name: The giant mean-looking earth beetle crawls towards you.
7004.name: the giant earth beetle~

7005.room_name: The giant maggot crawls toward you.
7005.name: the maggot~

description: The evil wanderer is very thin.  He is dressed in a grey cloak.
7007.room_name: The evil wanderer stares at you.
7007.name: the evil wanderer~

description:
The Homonculus appears in a man-like form, about 18'' tall, it has a
greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a bat-like mouth, with
teeth gleaming yellow.
7008.room_name: The homonculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.
7008.name: the homonculus~

description:
He is human...  You think.  He wears a dark cowl that covers the
features of his face, and while one can make out a nose, some teeth
and a pair of eyes, there's no telling what lies beneath that garb. 
His hands and feet are covered with leather gloves and boots and he
carries a staff, though he doesn't appear to be old.  On the contrary,
his quick moves and rapidly shifting head suggest he is still quite
apt at adventuring.
7009.room_name: A short fellow stands here scratching his head.
7009.name: {cL{yaa{cne {xthe {8Lo{wst {WA{wdventurer{x~

description:
The head and torso of a chreffn is copper-covered, with yellow,
glowing eyes. The lower body is in an orange shading.
7010.room_name: The chreffn are crawling here, looking around with their yellow eyes.
7010.name: the evil chreffn~

description:
It's a five feet tall, shadow monster. The shape of this creature lies
somewhere between a human and a rat. It breaths very heavily, while staring
at you with such a glint in the eyes that reminds you of immense hunger.
7011.room_name: The morkoth is standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!
7011.name: the shadowy morkoth~

description:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong
toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly. It's eyes are
glowing pale green.
7012.room_name: A {rh{co{rrn{ce{rd {wbas{yil{gisk{x lies here ready to strike at intruders.
7012.name: a {rh{co{rrn{ce{rd {wbas{yil{gisk{x~

description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner.
7013.room_name: A horrifying mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...
7013.name: the horrifying mudmonster~

description:
It's a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now. In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.
7200.room_name: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
7200.name: the master mindflayer~

description:
The gigantic rat is about ten foot long from head to tail and has claws
the size of your head looking very nasty.
7204.room_name: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
7204.name: the gigantic rat~

7454.d_flags: D Says 'HELP! HELP! SOME STINKING GROUND WALKER IS ATTACKING US!~
description:
He is short, fat.  A beard wraps around his face.  His cloths are
ragged and dirty.  In his hands, he holds a pair of dice.
7454.room_name: A short carvern dwarf wanders around here, rattling his dice.
7454.name: A Carvern Dwarf~
7454.t_flags: T Hey there stranger, wanna roll the dice?~

description: A small dirty rat crawls around here, looking for some food.
7455.room_name: A carvern rat crawls around here in the dark.
7455.name: a carvern rat~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
